checklistTaskDefaults.formatDeleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {0}? Deleting this task default will remove it from your list.
checklistTaskDefaults.lblInstructionsTaskDefaults: Set up task defaults for each office's tasks.
checklistTaskDefaults.lblNoTaskDefaults: To start working, add a task default

lblInstructionsStartDate: Enter the date from which tasks will start to be displayed. All tasks created before that date will still exist, but they will not be shown.
lblInstructionsThreshold: For tasks scheduled in the future enter the number of days before the due date that a task should be labeled "Upcoming". After that date, future tasks will be labeled "Later".

checklistTaskResources.formatOffsetDaysRange: Offset days range is from {0} to {1}
checklistTaskResources.lblActionDuplicated: Action is duplicated. Select a unique action
checklistTaskResources.lblDueDateInstrucctions: Determine the default due date. You can select it the due date is an exact date or a number of days after the task creation date
checklistTaskResources.lblEnterSetDueDate: Select a value for set due date as
checklistTaskResources.lblInstructionsDescription: This field accepts HTML. Use links with the target="blank" attribute to open the url in other tab
checklistTaskResources.lblNotesDescription: This field accepts HTML. Use links with the target="blank" attribute to open the url in other tab
